title: Minions Health Bar
body:
Hey, I was wondering if anyone could help me to change the health bar color of the minions, just like this 
http://prntscr.com/cu6im2

Thanks

replies.body: Start a custom game and press "esc" then click the "video" tab on the left and in the options there should be a little square on the right side that says "use relative team colors" select it.
It didn't work, the health bar color it's still the same.

it only changes stuff if you're on red side and changes it to Blue from red.
Maybe colourblind mode is on in the "esc" menu?  That's the only other thing I can think of it being.
What do your health bars look like right now?  Is your health bar blue?
If so you need to do a client repair, the asset might be missing from your client.
I don't see anything different here than the usual.  This is how I see minions, so I'm not really sure what's being asked here.  :(  Let me know with some more detail, and I'll try to help!
Hey, on my game the health bar color is the same as the minion color!
